code: /**  * Compute the score.  * @param weight weight computed by the {@link SimilarityWeightScript} if any, or 1.  * @param query  scoring factors that come from the query  * @param field  field-level statistics  * @param term   term-level statistics  * @param doc    per-document statistics  */ public abstract double execute(double weight, ScriptedSimilarity.Query query, ScriptedSimilarity.Field field, ScriptedSimilarity.Term term, ScriptedSimilarity.Doc doc).
